headline.main: 2 U.S. GENERALS FLEW ON RAID OVER BREST; Hansell and Armstrong Took Part in Bombing Attack

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Feb. 28 (AP) -- Brig. Gens. H. S. Hansell Jr. of San Antonio, Texas, and Frank A. Armstrong of Asheville, N.C., flew with the American Flying Fortress and Liberator formations that dumped tons of bombs on Brest yesterday, United States Army Air Force Headquarters announced today.
abstract: Brig Gens H S Hansell Jr and F A Armstrong role in Brest raid described; crews laud RAF fighter protection
